source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Oranges / Tangerines - Still Life

visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will paint Oranges still life with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint still life with fruits: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, sponging, blending, glazing
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Pottery Wheel Throwing & Kiln Firing for Complete Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Skreppa Studio
visible_instructors.name: Skreppa
visible_instructors.job_title: Taking Time Off, Making Life Out of Art

items.headline: Kick off your pottery journey with a deep dive into the fundamental techniques of transforming clay to pottery
objectives_summary: Discover step-by-step techniques to making your own pottery on the electric potter's wheel from start to finish
Develop an understanding of essential materials, tools and equipment to create your own pottery studio
Accelerate your pace of perfecting pottery pieces by employing tried-and-tested methods

items.title: Learn to Paint a Bear and Hummingbird Step-by-Step
items.headline: Instructional Painting Video with additional Art Business Lectures!
objectives_summary: Students will develop a broader understanding of painting techniques and developing a painting through common stages. The student will also have a painting to enjoy and hang on their wall!
Students will learn how to frame, market, sell and ship their paintings to customers.

items.title: How to make a Scribbler's Notebook

visible_instructors.title: Nina Vangerow
visible_instructors.name: Nina
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist & Creator at The Forgotten Bookshop Girl

items.headline: Learn how to make a simple notebook from materials you have at home.
objectives_summary: The Basic Scribbler's Notebook lesson will teach you how to create a quick and simple little Scribbler's Notebook  use  materials that you most probably have lying around at home think about recycling materials that would normally  go into the recycling cut the pages and cover put a notebook together without actually binding it add little extras, eg a spine band and label

Version 2 of the Scribbler's Notebook lesson will teach you how to  turn it into a personalised notebook, made with a certain theme in mind add beautiful images from magazines add envelopes to create pockets in your notebook ideas on other kinds of paper you can use in your notebook I will also talk you through any creative challenges you might encounter on the way

Version 3 of the Scribbler's Notebook lesson will teach you how to  vary the sizes of your notebooks think about a certain purpose for the notebook think about different options for your journal cover use the idea of the Scribbler's Notebook to create beautiful presents for friends and family

items.title: How to Draw 100+Animals In Simple Steps ( Volume-1)
items.headline: This is "How to draw" related animals course.Can be drawn easily with Pencils.It comes with my basic voice prompts.
objectives_summary: Students will learn to draw various drawings in simple steps.
Students will learn to draw various drawings from scratch usually an eye or a face as starting point.
Students will learn how to draw elegant drawings of various animals and figures.

items.title: How To Cross Stitch - Volume 2
items.headline: Your Step By Step Guide to Cross Stitching - Volume 2
objectives_summary: Be able to know the step-by-step guide to cross stitching

items.title: Learn to crochet from the beginning and beyond

visible_instructors.title: Mandy Haynes
visible_instructors.name: Mandy
visible_instructors.job_title: Crochet, learn at your own pace

items.headline: Learn to crochet at your own pace
objectives_summary: Different kinds of yarn
Different kinds of hooks
Gauging

items.title: Botanical Series: Watercolor Bouquet of Lilies in Watercolor
items.headline: Take up a challenge and paint a watercolor bouquet of lilies with advanced techniques
objectives_summary: Choosing the right colors and mixing paints for your flowers
Using wet-on-wet technique to create loose lilies in watercolor
Using the layering technique to add volume and depth to each flower.

items.title: Making Drama and Theatre: Traditional Techniques
items.headline: A beginners guide to the conventions typically used to make drama and theatre.
objectives_summary: DISCOVER THE FUNDAMENTALS TRADITIONALLY USED TO MAKE THEATRE.
Discover how to reveal the playwright's purpose in a play.
Recognize how key features in popular genres and styles engage an audience.

items.title: Woodworking: Make A Colourful 24 Piece Wooden Jigsaw Puzzle
items.headline: Learn how to design, cut and paint the pieces of a stunning jigsaw puzzle as a perfect gift or for a child to play with.
objectives_summary: How to design and make a colourful 24 piece jigsaw puzzle from plywood
Use a scrollsaw to cut out a design that has been applied to a plywood
Paint the pieces of the jigsaw puzzle in primary, non-adjacent colours

items.title: How to Make whipped Soap, Make Shea Butter Soap & Soap Jelly
items.headline: This course is a Complete Guidelines to make whipped Soap Easily
objectives_summary: How to Make Whipped Soap step by step with details
How to make a soap Base?
Combining with Hard Oils

items.title: The Ultimate Sketching Tutorial- A Complete Course For All
items.headline: Learn the fundamental skill of drawing portraits, illusion sketches,3D art and many more in this ultimate sketch course.
objectives_summary: How to draw a portrait from scratch!
Establish Concentration and Improve Hand-Eye Coordination
Draw portraits with charcoal pencil

items.title: Beginning with Willow Weaving
items.headline: The figure of Eight Weave
objectives_summary: How to weave willow
How to prepare frames for weaving
How to select materials

items.title: Acrylic Painting Course - Cake
items.headline: Learn acrylic painting techniques creating beautiful Cake
objectives_summary: Acrylic Painting
Color Mixing
Creating Highlights, Lights and Darks

items.title: Paint a Lively Sea Turtle in Watercolor:
items.headline: Learn How to Create Texture and Simplify Complex Animals
objectives_summary: By the end of this class you will have illustrated and painted your very own sea turtle in watercolor
I will show how to simplify complex animals and using salt to create remarkable textures

items.title: Learn Loose Watercolors: Coastal Landscapes
items.headline: Draw and Paint 6 Classic Coastal Landscapes!
objectives_summary: How to Draw and compose your painting - these lessons are placed at the beginning of each demonstration to show you how I sketch in basic details. I will show you how to place the horizon line, and how to quickly and accurately sketch in the reference photo. I will also talk about how I use my sketch to plan out the steps of my watercolor painting afterwards.

How to paint skies, water, boats, buildings and figures in soft and loose manner, using a combination of wet-in-wet and wet-in-dry techniques. I'll talk about how and when to wet your watercolor paper to obtain particular results such as the appearance of soft clouds, and when to paint in more rigid and accurate shapes once the paper has dried.
The importance of timing in watercolors and when to use different brushes.
